items.question: Which of the following is a valid criticism of Piaget’s Theory?

choices.text: He used extensive studies of large samples of children and did not examine children as individuals
Children in preoperations have been found to engage in formal operational thinking

They have only innate reflexes with which to engage the world

The child answers, “no longer, the other one has more.” What skill does the child lack?

The child in the pre-operation stage
